short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters photos from WhatsApp web chats that include a given image by popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your WhatsApp experience with the WhatsApp Photo Filter extension for Chrome! This handy extension empowers you to effortlessly filter your photo albums based on a specific face, making it easier than ever to find and relive your cherished moments.
